channel.title: Restaurant
channel.description:
Greetings! Basically my dad decided that he's gonna build a pizzeria in the place of this shop we have right now: I told him several times that he shouldn't do this because 1) lots of money is needed 2) the place isn't that crowded so I have doubts about good income, but he still decided to get on with the project.
The builders will be starting on 1.11.2009 and it'll be finished in about 5 months. I want to ask you guys to make an advertisement paper thingy where all the different pizzas, salads, drinks etc. are listed. Something creative, yet warm, perhaps? Don't know. Of course he could just go to the place where they print these ads and get already made ones, just change the name, but I thought it'd be better to get something different.
Also, the name for the place hasn't been decided yet, so you can suggest that too!
EDIT: by the paper thingy I mean the menu which I'll be throwing into people's mail boxes and stuff so they can order.
THANKS
(i dont know if this is supposed to be here, but meh...)

item.title: Restaurant
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

AceKeiven:

I don’t know your father’s goal in deciding to have a restaurant business. Can we set aside that, Actually, I started with nothing, and I pursue to study well in the field of cooking different menus. Fortunately now, I have a small restaurant and the most important to be considered is to have an experience and background in cooking.

I don’t know what you just said but I am strongly convinced it has very little to do with the thread.

Read full topic
